ygData.subject: Re: Battle bard vs singing bard (was Does CHR affect Largos?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I can say positively that this is not the case.  In lower guk at one point a while back (late 30s probably, maybe low 40s), I got about a 25% resist rate,
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 9 Feb 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:

> primarily based on your level vs the mobs level. A 25 bard with a 90 CHR
> has the same chance of getting a Chains to stick on a mob as a 25 bard with
> a 130 CHR.

I can say positively that this is not the case. In lower guk at one point
a while back (late 30s probably, maybe low 40s), I got about a 25% resist
rate, maybe a bit less, with all my gear on. I died, and two necros
escorted me back to my corpse. My job was to chain frogs to keep them
from running, and I got near 80% resist the whole way in.

That incident sold me on the value of charisma. My current unbuffed is
157, and I'm looking into getting the cha stat bracers made for when it
counts.

Athren
